alert.note: Alert for Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 23 at 4:54PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Showers and thunderstorms may produce strong winds over portions of northeastern Stillwater, southeastern Wheatland, west central Yellowstone, southern Golden Valley and northeastern Sweet Grass Counties through 545 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of showers and isolated thunderstorms from Big Timber to northeast of Rapelje, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts to around 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Big Timber, Ryegate, Broadview, Lavina, Franklin, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Molt, Acton, Melville, Greycliff, Rapelje and Comanche. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Beartooth Foothills; Golden Valley; Melville Foothills; Northern Stillwater; Northern Sweet Grass; Southern Wheatland; Southwestern Yellowstone
